title: Accessing the Wordbank database
text: get_administration_data() function gives -administration information, either specific language /form instruments.

title: Accessing the Wordbank database
text: get_item_data() function gives -item information, either specific language /form instruments.
code: get_item_data(language = "Italian", form = "WG") ## # A tibble: 505 × 11 ##    item_id language form  form_type item_kind   category item_definition         ##    <chr>   <chr>    <chr> <chr>     <chr>       <chr>    <chr>                   ##  1 item_1  Italian  WG    WG        first_signs NA       Risponde quando è chia… ##  2 item_2  Italian  WG    WG        first_signs NA       Risponde ad un No       ##  3 item_3  Italian  WG    WG        first_signs NA       Reagisce ad un C'è la … ##  4 item_4  Italian  WG    WG        phrases     NA       Vuoi la pappa           ##  5 item_5  Italian  WG    WG        phrases     NA       Hai sonno? Sei stanco   ##  6 item_6  Italian  WG    WG        phrases     NA       Vuoi bere?              ##  7 item_7  Italian  WG    WG        phrases     NA       Stai attento            ##  8 item_8  Italian  WG    WG        phrases     NA       Stai buono              ##  9 item_9  Italian  WG    WG        phrases     NA       Batti le manine         ## 10 item_10 Italian  WG    WG        phrases     NA       Cambiamo il pannolino   ## # ℹ 495 more rows ## # ℹ 4 more variables: english_gloss <chr>, uni_lemma <chr>, ## #   lexical_category <chr>, complexity_category <chr> get_item_data() ## # A tibble: 40,959 × 11 ##    item_id language           form  form_type item_kind category item_definition ##    <chr>   <chr>              <chr> <chr>     <chr>     <chr>    <chr>           ##  1 item_1  British Sign Lang… WG    WG        phrases   NA       be careful      ##  2 item_2  British Sign Lang… WG    WG        phrases   NA       bring me        ##  3 item_3  British Sign Lang… WG    WG        phrases   NA       change nappy    ##  4 item_4  British Sign Lang… WG    WG        phrases   NA       come here       ##  5 item_5  British Sign Lang… WG    WG        phrases   NA       daddy/mummy ho… ##  6 item_6  British Sign Lang… WG    WG        phrases   NA       donttouch       ##  7 item_7  British Sign Lang… WG    WG        phrases   NA       finish          ##  8 item_8  British Sign Lang… WG    WG        phrases   NA       get up          ##  9 item_9  British Sign Lang… WG    WG        phrases   NA       give me hug     ## 10 item_10 British Sign Lang… WG    WG        phrases   NA       give me kiss    ## # ℹ 40,949 more rows ## # ℹ 4 more variables: english_gloss <chr>, uni_lemma <chr>, ## #   lexical_category <chr>, complexity_category <chr>

title: Accessing the Wordbank database
text: looking total vocabulary size, admins need, since productive receptive vocabulary sizes calculated. looking specific items subsets items, need load instrument data, using get_instrument_data() function. Pass instrument language form, along list items want extract (item_id). default get_instrument_table() returns data frame columns administration’s data_id, item’s num_item_id (numerical item_id), corresponding value. include administration information, can set administrations argument TRUE, pass result get_administration_data() administrations (way can prevent administration data loaded multiple times). Similarly, can set iteminfo argument TRUE, pass result get_item_data(). Loading data fast need handful items, time scales linearly number items, can get quite slow need many . , ’s good idea filter items need calling get_instrument_data(). example, let’s say want look production animal words English Words & Sentences age. First get items want: get instrument data items: Finally, calculate many animals words child produces median number animals age bin:
code: get_instrument_data(   language = "English (American)",   form = "WS",   items = c("item_26", "item_46") ) ## # A tibble: 17,706 × 5 ##    data_id item_id value      produces understands ##      <dbl> <chr>   <chr>      <lgl>    <lgl>       ##  1  245518 item_26 "produces" TRUE     NA          ##  2  245519 item_26 "produces" TRUE     NA          ##  3  245520 item_26 "produces" TRUE     NA          ##  4  245521 item_26 "produces" TRUE     NA          ##  5  245522 item_26 ""         FALSE    NA          ##  6  245523 item_26 "produces" TRUE     NA          ##  7  245524 item_26 "produces" TRUE     NA          ##  8  245525 item_26 "produces" TRUE     NA          ##  9  245526 item_26 "produces" TRUE     NA          ## 10  245527 item_26 ""         FALSE    NA          ## # ℹ 17,696 more rows animals <- get_item_data(language = "English (American)", form = "WS") %>%   filter(category == "animals") animal_data <- get_instrument_data(language = "English (American)",                                    form = "WS",                                    items = animals$item_id,                                    administration_info = TRUE,                                    item_info = TRUE) animal_summary <- animal_data %>%   group_by(age, data_id) %>%   summarise(num_animals = sum(produces, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%   group_by(age) %>%   summarise(median_num_animals = median(num_animals, na.rm = TRUE))    ggplot(animal_summary, aes(x = age, y = median_num_animals)) +   geom_point() +   labs(x = "Age (months)", y = "Median animal words producing")

title: Accessing the Wordbank database
text: get_instruments() function gives information CDI instruments Wordbank.
code: get_instruments() ## # A tibble: 78 × 8 ##    instrument_id language            form  form_type age_min age_max has_grammar ##            <int> <chr>               <chr> <chr>       <int>   <int>       <int> ##  1             1 British Sign Langu… WG    WG              8      36           0 ##  2             2 Cantonese           WS    WS             16      30           0 ##  3             3 Croatian            WG    WG              8      16           0 ##  4             4 Croatian            WS    WS             16      30           0 ##  5             5 Danish              WG    WG              8      20           0 ##  6             6 Danish              WS    WS             16      36           1 ##  7             7 English (American)  WG    WG              8      18           0 ##  8             8 English (American)  WS    WS             16      30           1 ##  9             9 French (Quebecois)  WG    WG              8      16           0 ## 10            10 French (Quebecois)  WS    WS             16      30           1 ## # ℹ 68 more rows ## # ℹ 1 more variable: unilemma_coverage <dbl>

title: Accessing the Wordbank database
text: get_datasets() function gives information datasets Wordbank, either specific language /form instruments. admin_data argument set TRUE, results also include number administrations database dataset.
code: get_datasets(form = "WG") ## # A tibble: 42 × 11 ##    dataset_id dataset_name  dataset_origin_name     contributor citation license ##         <int> <chr>         <chr>                   <chr>       <chr>    <chr>   ##  1          5 Marchman      Marchman_Norming_Engli… Larry Fens… "Fenson… CC-BY   ##  2          6 Byers         Byers__English (Americ… Krista Bye… ""       CC-BY   ##  3          7 Thal          Thal                    Donna Thal… "Thal, … CC-BY   ##  4          9 Marchman      Marchman_Norming_Spani… Donna Jack… "Jackso… CC-BY   ##  5         12 Kristoffersen Kristoffersen_longitud… Hanne Simo… "Simons… CC-BY   ##  6         13 CLEX          CLEX__Croatian_WG       Melita Kov… "Kovace… CC-BY   ##  7         17 CLEX          CLEX__Russian_WG        Stella Cey… "Е.А.Ве… CC-BY   ##  8         19 CLEX          CLEX__Swedish_WG        Mårten Eri… "Erikss… CC-BY   ##  9         21 CLEX          CLEX__Turkish_WG        Aylin Künt… "Acarla… CC-BY   ## 10         23 Shalev        Shalev__Hebrew_WG       Hila Gendl… "Gendle… CC-BY   ## # ℹ 32 more rows ## # ℹ 5 more variables: longitudinal <lgl>, source <chr>, language <chr>, ## #   form <chr>, form_type <chr> get_datasets(language = "Spanish (Mexican)", admin_data = TRUE) ## # A tibble: 7 × 12 ##   dataset_id dataset_name dataset_origin_name       contributor citation license ##        <int> <chr>        <chr>                     <chr>       <chr>    <chr>   ## 1          8 Marchman     Marchman Dallas Bilingual Donna Jack… Marchma… CC-BY   ## 2          9 Marchman     Marchman_Norming_Spanish… Donna Jack… Jackson… CC-BY   ## 3         55 Fernald      Fernald_Outreach_Spanish… Anne Ferna… Weisled… CC-BY   ## 4         56 Fernald      Fernald_Outreach_Spanish… Anne Ferna… Weisled… CC-BY   ## 5         76 Marchman     Marchman_Norming_Spanish… Donna Jack… Jackson… CC-BY   ## 6         87 Hoff         Hoff_English_Mexican_Bil… Hoff, E     Hoff, E… CC-BY   ## 7        135 Hoff         Hoff_English_Mexican_Bil… Hoff, E     Hoff, E… CC-BY   ## title: Accessing the Wordbank database
text: fit_aoa() function computes estimates items’ age acquisition (AoA). needs provided data frame returned get_instrument_data() – one row per administration x item combination, minimally columns age num_item_id. returns data frame one row per item aoa column estimate, preserving item-level columns input data. AoA estimated computing proportion administrations child understands/produces (measure) word, smoothing proportion using method, taking age smoothed value greater proportion.
code: fit_aoa(animal_data) ## # A tibble: 43 × 8 ##      aoa item_id item_kind item_definition category lexical_category uni_lemma ##    <dbl> <chr>   <chr>     <chr>           <chr>    <chr>            <chr>     ##  1    26 item_13 word      alligator       animals  nouns            alligator ##  2    25 item_14 word      animal          animals  nouns            animal    ##  3    26 item_15 word      ant             animals  nouns            ant       ##  4    21 item_16 word      bear            animals  nouns            bear      ##  5    22 item_17 word      bee             animals  nouns            bee       ##  6    19 item_18 word      bird            animals  nouns            bird      ##  7    23 item_19 word      bug             animals  nouns            bug       ##  8    22 item_20 word      bunny           animals  nouns            bunny     ##  9    24 item_21 word      butterfly       animals  nouns            butterfly ## 10    19 item_22 word      cat             animals  nouns            cat       ## # ℹ 33 more rows ## # ℹ 1 more variable: complexity_category <chr> fit_aoa(animal_data, method = "glmrob", proportion = 1/3) ## # A tibble: 43 × 8 ##      aoa item_id item_kind item_definition category lexical_category uni_lemma ##    <dbl> <chr>   <chr>     <chr>           <chr>    <chr>            <chr>     ##  1    24 item_13 word      alligator       animals  nouns            alligator ##  2    23 item_14 word      animal          animals  nouns            animal    ##  3    23 item_15 word      ant             animals  nouns            ant       ##  4    18 item_16 word      bear            animals  nouns            bear      ##  5    19 item_17 word      bee             animals  nouns            bee       ##  6    NA item_18 word      bird            animals  nouns            bird      ##  7    21 item_19 word      bug             animals  nouns            bug       ##  8    19 item_20 word      bunny           animals  nouns            bunny     ##  9    22 item_21 word      butterfly       animals  nouns            butterfly ## 10    NA item_22 word      cat             animals  nouns            cat       ## # ℹ 33 more rows ## # ℹ 1 more variable: complexity_category <chr>

title: Accessing the Wordbank database
text: One item-level fields uni_lemma (“universal lemma”), intended approximate semantic mapping words across languages Wordbank. function get_crossling_items() simply gives available uni_lemma values. function get_crossling_data() takes vector uni_lemmas returns data frame summary statistics item mapped uni_lemma language (WG forms). row combination item age, columns indicate number children (n_children), means (comprehension, production), standard deviations (comprehension_sd, production_sd), item-level fields.
code: get_crossling_items() ## # A tibble: 2,552 × 2 ##       id uni_lemma                 ##    <int> <chr>                     ##  1  1739 (hair)brush               ##  2  1552 (play)pen                 ##  3  1494 (sheep)                   ##  4  1783 (to be in) pain           ##  5  1777 (to be) hungry            ##  6  1775 (to be) thirsty           ##  7  1769 (to have) breakfast       ##  8  1272 [possessive]              ##  9  1593 [to splash in the water?] ## 10  1951 1PL                       ## # ℹ 2,542 more rows get_crossling_data(uni_lemmas = c("hat", "nose")) %>%   select(language, uni_lemma, item_definition, age, n_children, comprehension,          production, comprehension_sd, production_sd) %>%   arrange(uni_lemma)

text: See instruments (languages forms) available: Get -administration data: Get -item data: Get administration--item data: details, see vignette.
code: instrument <- get_instruments() english_ws_admins <- get_administration_data("English (American)", "WS") all_admins <- get_administration_data() english_ws_items <- get_item_data("English (American)", "WS") all_items <- get_item_data() english_ws_data <- get_instrument_data("English (American)", "WS")

what: Fit age of acquisition estimates for Wordbank data — fit_aoa
title: Fit age of acquisition estimates for Wordbank data — fit_aoa
text: item input data, estimate age acquisition earliest age (months) proportion children understand/produce item greater threshold. proportions used can empirical first smoothed model.

title: Fit age of acquisition estimates for Wordbank data — fit_aoa
code: fit_aoa(   instrument_data,   measure = "produces",   method = "glm",   proportion = 0.5,   age_min = min(instrument_data$age, na.rm = TRUE),   age_max = max(instrument_data$age, na.rm = TRUE) )

title: Fit age of acquisition estimates for Wordbank data — fit_aoa
text: instrument_data data frame returned get_instrument_data, must "age" column "num_item_id" column. measure One "produces" "understands" (defaults "produces"). method string indicating smoothing method use: empirical use empirical proportions,  glm fit logistic linear model, glmrob robust logistic linear model (defaults glm). proportion number 0 1 indicating threshold proportion children. age_min minimum age allow age acquisition. Defaults minimum age instrument_data age_max maximum age allow age acquisition. Defaults maximum age instrument_data

title: Fit age of acquisition estimates for Wordbank data — fit_aoa
text: data frame every row item, item-level columns   input data preserved, aoa column contains age   acquisition estimates.

title: Fit age of acquisition estimates for Wordbank data — fit_aoa
code: # \donttest{ eng_ws_data <- get_instrument_data(language = "English (American)",                                    form = "WS",                                    items = c("item_1", "item_42"),                                    administration_info = TRUE) if (!is.null(eng_ws_data)) eng_ws_aoa <- fit_aoa(eng_ws_data) # }

what: Fit quantiles to vocabulary sizes using quantile regression — fit_vocab_quantiles
title: Fit quantiles to vocabulary sizes using quantile regression — fit_vocab_quantiles
text: Fit quantiles vocabulary sizes using quantile regression

title: Fit quantiles to vocabulary sizes using quantile regression — fit_vocab_quantiles
code: fit_vocab_quantiles(vocab_data, measure, group, quantiles = "standard")

title: Fit quantiles to vocabulary sizes using quantile regression — fit_vocab_quantiles
text: vocab_data data frame returned get_administration_data. measure column vocab_data vocabulary values (production comprehension). group (Optional) column vocab_data group . quantiles Either one "standard" (default), "deciles", "quintiles", "quartiles", "median", numeric vector quantile values.

title: Fit quantiles to vocabulary sizes using quantile regression — fit_vocab_quantiles
text: data frame columns "language", "form", "age", group (specified), "quantile", measure, measure   fit vocabulary value quantile age.

title: Fit quantiles to vocabulary sizes using quantile regression — fit_vocab_quantiles
code: # \donttest{ eng_wg <- get_administration_data(language = "English (American)",                                   form = "WG",                                   include_demographic_info = TRUE) if (!is.null(eng_wg)) {   vocab_quantiles <- fit_vocab_quantiles(eng_wg, production)   vocab_quantiles_sex <- fit_vocab_quantiles(eng_wg, production, sex)   vocab_quartiles <- fit_vocab_quantiles(eng_wg, production, quantiles = "quartiles") } #> Warning: `fit_vocab_quantiles()` was deprecated in wordbankr 1.0.0. #> ℹ Please use the vocabulary norms shiny app at #>   http://wordbank.stanford.edu/analyses?name=vocab_norms # }

what: Get the Wordbank by-administration data — get_administration_data
title: Get the Wordbank by-administration data — get_administration_data
text: Get Wordbank -administration data

title: Get the Wordbank by-administration data — get_administration_data
code: get_administration_data(   language = NULL,   form = NULL,   filter_age = TRUE,   include_demographic_info = FALSE,   include_birth_info = FALSE,   include_health_conditions = FALSE,   include_language_exposure = FALSE,   db_args = NULL )

title: Get the Wordbank by-administration data — get_administration_data
text: language optional string specifying language's administrations retrieve. form optional string specifying form's administrations retrieve. filter_age logical indicating whether filter administrations ones valid age range instrument. include_demographic_info logical indicating whether include child's demographic information (birth_order, ethnicity, race, sex, caregiver_education). include_birth_info logical indicating whether include child's birth information (birth_weight, born_early_or_late, gestational_age, zygosity). include_health_conditions logical indicating whether include child's health condition information (nested dataframe health_conditions column health_condition_name). include_language_exposure logical indicating whether include child's language exposure information time administration (nested dataframe language_exposures columns language, exposure_proportion, age_of_first_exposure). db_args List arguments connect wordbank mysql database (host, dbname, user, password).

title: Get the Wordbank by-administration data — get_administration_data
text: data frame row CDI administration column   variable administration (data_id,  date_of_test, age, comprehension, production,  is_norming), dataset (dataset_name,  dataset_origin_name, language, form,  form_type), information child described   parameter specification.

title: Get the Wordbank by-administration data — get_administration_data
code: # \donttest{ english_ws_admins <- get_administration_data("English (American)", "WS") all_admins <- get_administration_data() # }

title: Get the Wordbank data sources — get_datasets
text: language optional string specifying language's datasets retrieve. form optional string specifying form's datasets retrieve. admin_data logical indicating whether include summary-level statistics administrations within dataset. db_args List arguments connect wordbank mysql database (host, dbname, user, password).

title: Get the Wordbank data sources — get_datasets
text: data frame row particular dataset   characteristics: dataset_id, dataset_name,  dataset_origin_name (unique identifier groups datasets   may share children), language, form, form_type,  contributor (contributor name affiliated institution),  citation, license, longitudinal (whether dataset   includes longitudinal participants). Also includes summary statistics   dataset admin_data flag TRUE: number   administrations (n_admins).

title: Get the Wordbank data sources — get_datasets
code: # \donttest{ english_ws_datasets <- get_datasets(language = "English (American)",                                     form = "WS",                                     admin_data = TRUE) # }

what: Get the Wordbank administration-by-item data — get_instrument_data
title: Get the Wordbank administration-by-item data — get_instrument_data
text: Get Wordbank administration--item data

title: Get the Wordbank administration-by-item data — get_instrument_data
code: get_instrument_data(   language,   form,   items = NULL,   administration_info = FALSE,   item_info = FALSE,   db_args = NULL,   ... )

title: Get the Wordbank administration-by-item data — get_instrument_data
text: language string instrument's language (insensitive case whitespace). form string instrument's form (insensitive case whitespace). items character vector column names instrument_table items extract. supplied, defaults columns instrument_table. administration_info Either logical indicating whether include administration data data frame administration data (returned get_administration_data). item_info Either logical indicating whether include item data data frame item data (returned get_item_data). db_args List arguments connect wordbank mysql database (host, dbname, user, password). ... <[`dynamic-dots`][rlang::dyn-dots]> Arguments passed get_administration_data().

title: Get the Wordbank administration-by-item data — get_instrument_data
text: data frame row contains values (value,  produces, understands) given item (item_id)   given administration (data_id), additional columns variables   administration item, specified.

title: Get the Wordbank administration-by-item data — get_instrument_data
code: # \donttest{ eng_ws_data <- get_instrument_data(language = "English (American)",                                    form = "WS",                                    items = c("item_1", "item_42"),                                    item_info = TRUE) # }

code: get_instrument_table(src, language, form)

title: Connect to an instrument's Wordbank table — get_instrument_table
text: src connection Wordbank database. language string instrument's language (insensitive case whitespace). form string instrument's form (insensitive case whitespace).

title: Connect to an instrument's Wordbank table — get_instrument_table
text: tbl object containing instrument's data.

title: Get the Wordbank instruments — get_instruments
text: Get Wordbank instruments

title: Get the Wordbank instruments — get_instruments
text: db_args List arguments connect wordbank mysql database (host, dbname, user, password).

title: Get the Wordbank instruments — get_instruments
text: data frame row CDI instrument column   variable instrument (instrument_id, language,  form, age_min, age_max, has_grammar).

title: Get the Wordbank instruments — get_instruments
code: # \donttest{ instruments <- get_instruments() # }

what: Get the Wordbank by-item data — get_item_data
title: Get the Wordbank by-item data — get_item_data
text: Get Wordbank -item data

title: Get the Wordbank by-item data — get_item_data
code: get_item_data(language = NULL, form = NULL, db_args = NULL)

title: Get the Wordbank by-item data — get_item_data
text: language optional string specifying language's items retrieve. form optional string specifying form's items retrieve. db_args List arguments connect wordbank mysql database (host, dbname, user, password).

title: Get the Wordbank by-item data — get_item_data
text: data frame row CDI item column   variable : item_id, item_kind (e.g. word, gestures,   word_endings), item_definition, english_gloss,  language, form, form_type, category (meaning-based group shown CDI form), lexical_category,  lexical_class, complexity_category, uni_lemma).

title: Get the Wordbank by-item data — get_item_data
code: # \donttest{ english_ws_items <- get_item_data("English (American)", "WS") all_items <- get_item_data() # }

title: Get database connection arguments — get_wordbank_args
text: Get database connection arguments

title: Get database connection arguments — get_wordbank_args
code: get_wordbank_args()

title: Get database connection arguments — get_wordbank_args
text: List database connection arguments: host, db_name, username,   password

title: Get database connection arguments — get_wordbank_args
code: # \donttest{ get_wordbank_args() #> $host #> [1] "wordbank2-prod.canyiscnpddk.us-west-2.rds.amazonaws.com" #>  #> $dbname #> [1] "wordbank" #>  #> $user #> [1] "wordbank_reader" #>  #> $password #> [1] "ICanOnlyRead@99" #>  # }

title: Get item-by-age summary statistics — summarise_items
text: Get item--age summary statistics

title: Get item-by-age summary statistics — summarise_items
code: summarise_items(item_data, db_args = NULL)

title: Get item-by-age summary statistics — summarise_items
text: item_data dataframe returned get_item_data(). db_args List arguments connect wordbank mysql database (host, dbname, user, password).

title: Get item-by-age summary statistics — summarise_items
text: dataframe row combination item age,   columns summary statistics group: number children   (n_children), means (comprehension, production),   standard deviations (comprehension_sd, production_sd); also   retains item-level variables lang_items (item_id,  item_definition, uni_lemma, lexical_category).

title: Get item-by-age summary statistics — summarise_items
code: # \donttest{ italian_items <- get_item_data(language = "Italian", form = "WG") if (!is.null(italian_items)) {   italian_dog <- dplyr::filter(italian_items, uni_lemma == "dog")   italian_dog_summary <- summarise_items(italian_dog) } #> Getting data for Italian WG # }
